>How do you get gtkterm to list /dev/ttyACM0

I don't know how to do it automatically.  For the example picture I typed it in manually.  You can always create a bash alias (shortcut) command for `gtkterm --port /dev/ttyACM0`:

http://tldp.org/LDP/abs/html/sample-bashrc.html

Start a Terminal to edit your `.bashrc`

{{{
sudo gedit $HOME/.bashrc
}}}

with:

{{{
alias gtkt0='gtkterm --port /dev/ttyACM0'
}}}
